mapper.select: select list.edu_no, list.edu_name, list.instructor_no, list.edu_schedule, history.edu_state, history.emp_eval from education_history history, education_list list where history.edu_no = list.edu_no;

select l.edu_no edu_no, l.belong_no belong_no, l.edu_field edu_field, l.edu_code edu_code, l.edu_name edu_name, l.edu_target edu_target, l.manager manager, l.edu_way edu_way, l.edu_schedule edu_schedule, l.edu_date edu_date, l.edu_location edu_location, l.instructor_no instructor_no, l.budget budget, l.note note, l.applicants_limit applicants_limit, l.closing_date closing_date, l.approval_state approval_state, i.name instructor_name, b.name belong_name, e.edu_name edu_code_name from education_list l, instructor i, belong b, education_code e where l.instructor_no = i.instructor_no and l.belong_no = b.belong_no and l.edu_code = e.edu_code

select l.edu_no edu_no, l.belong_no belong_no, l.edu_field edu_field, l.edu_code edu_code, l.edu_name edu_name, l.edu_target edu_target, l.manager manager, l.edu_way edu_way, l.edu_schedule edu_schedule, l.edu_date edu_date, l.edu_location edu_location, l.instructor_no instructor_no, l.budget budget, l.note note, l.applicants_limit applicants_limit, l.closing_date closing_date, l.approval_state approval_state, i.name instructor_name, b.name belong_name, e.edu_name edu_code_name from education_list l, instructor i, belong b, education_code e where l.instructor_no = i.instructor_no and l.belong_no = b.belong_no and l.edu_code = e.edu_code and l.edu_no=#{edu_no}
